note.p: Bricklayer. Of Down, Kent. Married Hannah Duck at Lee, Kent, in 1829. Father of Isaac Withers Laslett (1830–87). Founder member of the Down Friendly Society, 1850.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/482/6/4/3)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 27 January 2015)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 27 January 2015)
